channel.title: Firefox
channel.description: When I try logging into Moparscape.org/smf or moparisthebest.com/smf it tells me that my password is incorrect if I am using Firefox. I tried the same exact thing on google chrome and I witnessed no issues. Not sure if it just me or not... Then I tried clicking I forgot my password, and it was unable to send to my email. It said, "Your session timed out while posting. Please go back and try again." Was wondering if it was just me or not...

item.title: Firefox
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Thanks, it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:6, topic:413759”][quote author=Travas link=topic=515720.msg3741233#msg3741233 date=1315360870]
Did you try clearing your cookies?
[/quote]
Not sure how to do this on the new firefox… I just downloaded the new version to see how it was since I’ve been using chrome for a while. I went to options and I didn’t see anything… I could look again though. May of overlooked it.[/quote]
If you still want to know how to do it, look here:
http://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Deleting%20cookies

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

To easily clear cookies just do Ctrl+Shift+Delete.

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Travas:

Did you try clearing your cookies?

Not sure how to do this on the new firefox… I just downloaded the new version to see how it was since I’ve been using chrome for a while. I went to options and I didn’t see anything… I could look again though. May of overlooked it.

[quote=“krackkid, post:4, topic:413759”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=515720.msg3741242#msg3741242 date=1315361398]

Did you try clearing your cookies chrome?

[/quote][/quote]
It works. But I hate it when it does this kind of stuff…

Read full topic

item.title: Firefox
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:4, topic:413759”][quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=515720.msg3741242#msg3741242 date=1315361398]

Did you try clearing your cookies chrome?

[/quote][/quote]

The Wanderer:

I tried the same exact thing on google chrome and I witnessed no issues.

Download CCleaner, it’s useful for cleaning cache + cookies and what not.

Read full topic
